mapper.insert: insert into club_board (club_board_no, club_no, club_board_writer, club_board_content) values(#{clubBoardNo}, #{clubNo}, #{clubBoardWriter}, #{clubBoardContent})
mapper.update: update club_board set club_board_content = #{clubBoardContent} where club_board_no = #{clubBoardNo}
mapper.select: select club_board_no from club_board where club_no = #{club_no}

select C.club_board_no, C.club_board_count, C.club_board_like, C.club_board_time, C.club_board_content, C.club_no , C.club_board_writer, C.club_board_readcount, C.club_board_reportcount, M.member_no , M.member_animal , M.member_birth, M.member_nick , M.member_animal, M.member_interest1, M.member_interest2, M.member_interest3, M.member_mbti, M.member_gender, M.member_place1, M.member_place2, M.member_place3, M.member_sns_id, M.member_logindate, P.attach_no as 프로필사진번호, B.animal_no as 동물번호, A.attach_no as 동물사진번호, L.like_member_no from club_board C left outer join member M on C.club_board_writer = M.member_no left outer join member_profile P on C.club_board_writer = P.member_no left outer join (select * from club_board_like where like_member_no = #{likeMemberNo}) L on C.club_board_No = L.club_board_no left outer join mbti_animal B on M.member_mbti = B.mbti left outer join animal_photo A on B.animal_no = A.animal_no where C.club_no = #{clubNo} order by ${column} ${order}

select M.member_animal, M.member_no , M.member_nick, M.member_interest1, M.member_interest2, M.member_interest3, M.member_birth, M.member_gender, M.member_place1, M.member_place2, M.member_place3, M.member_sns_id, M.member_logindate, P.attach_no from member M left outer join member_profile P on M.member_no = p.member_no where M.member_no = #{memberNo}
